title: The Question Returns

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of yesterday's tomorrow with ghost architectures of unlived lives, Evan and Architect among the monuments to what might have been
Medium shot of them finding a monument to 'The Life Where We Never Met', both touching it gently
Close on their intertwined forms creating new architecture together - building tomorrow's yesterday

key_themes: choosing this timeline over all others
transformation_notes: Yesterday's tomorrow becomes not a place of regret but of active choice. They're not mourning unlived lives but celebrating the one they're creating.
dialogue_rhythm: Reflective, philosophical but grounded in feeling
